name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of extensive experience in developing robust web applications and REST APIs. Proficient in **Python** (Django, FastAPI, Flask) and **JavaScript**, with a strong focus on internationalization and localization strategies. Skilled in collaborating within teams to deliver high-quality software solutions, leveraging open source technologies and methodologies. Experienced in optimizing backend systems for financial platforms and cloud-native architectures, utilizing **AWS** and **Azure**. Known for impactful contributions to projects at prestigious firms like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Django** to engineer robust backend services that enhance web applications and document automation workflows.
Developed and optimized **REST APIs** for seamless integration and internationalization processes, contributing to effective **localization** strategies.
Designed and implemented event-driven architectures with **Celery** and **Redis** to boost asynchronous processing capacities for transaction requests, improving system efficiency by **30%**.
Deployed and maintained microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to ensure a **99.9%** uptime for cloud operations.
Created reliable data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for regulatory data exchange, achieving a **40%** reduction in data latency.
Conducted thorough security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure and scalable authentication solutions, enhancing security compliance by **25%**.
Fostered team collaboration and communication across cross-functional teams, effectively addressing system integration challenges and refining release strategies, all while ensuring compliance with industry standards.

• Developed web applications utilizing **Python** and **Django** to enhance internationalization and localization features, improving user experience for global markets.
• Created and maintained **REST APIs** for efficient data exchange, ensuring high performance and scalability to handle over **10,000** requests per minute.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, using strong **communication** skills to align on project goals and objectives, achieving a **20%** reduction in project delivery time.
• Implemented open source solutions, contributing to the **Pontoon** project, leading to improved localization workflows and stakeholder satisfaction.
• Employed **JavaScript** for frontend enhancements, integrating with backend services to deliver seamless user experiences across platforms.
• Leveraged expertise in **team collaboration** tools to foster an inclusive development environment, resulting in enhanced productivity and morale among team members.
• Utilized **C++** and **Rust** for performance-critical modules, achieving optimization that improved processing times by up to **30%**.
• Actively participated in code reviews and mentorship sessions, encouraging a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the engineering team.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to develop robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking with a focus on enhancing trading operations.
Engineered high-performance real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data, accommodating over **500 transactions per second**.
Collaborated effectively with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and WebSocket channels, ensuring seamless user interaction with the trading platform by achieving a **99.9% uptime** rate.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while upholding internal data security protocols for over **10,000** user accounts.
Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, reducing bug rates by **30%** during development cycles.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management that resulted in a **25%** increase in processing efficiency.
Demonstrated strong team collaboration and communication skills throughout the development process, contributing to a more unified software engineering team.
